Side Effects: Very little dry mouth. Dont take at night cant sleep!
Comments: It will keep you wired for about 4 hours. The best thing is the headache and neack pain goes AWAY in 5-10 min FAST!!! It will wake you up in the morning FAST!!! I take 1 in the morning and 1 in mid day helps me focus and work without getting fatigued....Thanks Doc...
